name: generate-readme
description: Generate a comprehensive README.md file for a project

project_type.description: Type of project (web, mobile, cli, library, etc.)

include_badges.description: Include status badges in the README

execution.prompt_template: Analyze the project at {project_path} and generate a comprehensive README.md file. The project type is {project_type}. Include badges: {include_badges}. Include installation instructions, usage examples, and contribution guidelines.
